sidebar_position: 1
---

# Mermaid - Class Diagrams
Mermaid is a Javascript based diagramming and charting tool that uses 
Markdown-inspired text definitions to create diagrams.  See [mermaid class diagrams](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/classDiagram)
for syntax documentation.

## Basic Example
```text
classDiagram
	class IncentiveDiscountType {
		<<enum>>
		PERCENT_DISCOUNT
	}
	class IncentiveProgramType {
		<<enum>>
		QTY_DISCOUNT
		FREE_FREIGHT
		MYQ_REWARDS
	}
	class BaseSite {
		<<model>>
		+String uid
		String salesOrg
	}
	class IncentiveProgram {
		<<model>>
		+String code
		IncentiveProgramType incentiveProgramType
		String name
	}
	class QuantityIncentiveProgram {
		<<model>>
		IncentiveDiscountType incentiveDiscountType
	}
	class QuantityIncentiveProgramThreshold {
		<<model>>
		Integer minQuantityThreshold
		Double discountValue
	}
	class PrincipalGroup {
		<<model>>
		+String uid
	}
	class AbstractIncentiveProgramVisualInformation {
		<<model>>
		+String code
		BaseSite baseSite
		Media icon
		String bannerTitle
		String description
		String infoIconText
		String linkToCLP
	}
	class QuantityIncentiveProgramVisualInformation {
		<<model>>
		String widgetTitle
		String statusText
	}
	class FreeFreightIncentiveProgramVisualInformation {
		<<model>>
	}
	class MyQIncentiveProgramVisualInformation {
		<<model>>
		String statusText
	}
	class Product {
		<<model>>
	}
	
	IncentiveProgram "N" -- "N" Product: IncentiveProgram2ProductRelation
	IncentiveProgram <|-- QuantityIncentiveProgram
	IncentiveProgram o-- "N" AbstractIncentiveProgramVisualInformation
	AbstractIncentiveProgramVisualInformation <|-- QuantityIncentiveProgramVisualInformation
	AbstractIncentiveProgramVisualInformation <|-- FreeFreightIncentiveProgramVisualInformation
	AbstractIncentiveProgramVisualInformation <|-- MyQIncentiveProgramVisualInformation
	QuantityIncentiveProgram o-- "N" QuantityIncentiveProgramThreshold
	IncentiveProgram "N" -- "N" PrincipalGroup
```
